DOC.criteria: Age > = 19yr , < =40 yr Height 140 170 cm Singleton pregnancy Uncomplicated pregnancy Chinese Multiple gestation Pregnancyinduced hypertension Diabetes mellitus Chronic pain Allergic opioids and/or local anesthetic Failed perform inter lumbar space catheterization Organic dysfunction Contraindications neuraxial analgesia
